mapper.insert: insert into iep_contest (ct_no, me_no, ct_title, ct_host, ct_supervision, ct_entry, ct_enter, ct_award, ct_startdate, ct_enddate, ct_daydate, ct_statedate, ct_url, ct_content, ct_file1, ct_file2, ct_size2, ct_rdate, ct_cnt) values ((select nvl(max(ct_no), 0)+1 as ct_no from iep_contest), #{me_no},#{ct_title}, #{ct_host}, #{ct_supervision}, #{ct_entry}, #{ct_enter}, #{ct_award}, #{ct_startdate}, #{ct_enddate}, #{ct_daydate} ,#{ct_statedate}, #{ct_url}, #{ct_content}, #{ct_file1}, #{ct_file2}, #{ct_size2}, sysdate, 0)
mapper.select: select ct_no, ct_title, ct_host, ct_startdate, ct_enddate, ct_daydate, ct_cnt, ct_file2, ct_file1, ct_size2 from iep_contest order by ct_no DESC

SELECT COUNT(*) as cnt FROM iep_contest
where ct_title LIKE '%' || #{word} || '%'
where ct_content LIKE '%' || #{word} || '%'
where ct_title LIKE '%' || #{word} || '%' OR ct_content LIKE '%' || #{word} || '%'

SELECT ct_no, ct_title, ct_host, ct_startdate, ct_enddate, ct_daydate, ct_cnt, ct_file2, ct_file1, ct_size2, rownum as r FROM iep_contest
where ct_title LIKE '%' || #{word} || '%'
where ct_content LIKE '%' || #{word} || '%'
where ct_title LIKE '%' || #{word} || '%' OR ct_content LIKE '%' || #{word} || '%'
ORDER BY ct_no DESC
